item.title: Mermaid
item.description: Welcome to the mermaid page. What is Mermaid? linkMermaid is a JavaScript-based diagramming and charting tool that uses Markdown-inspired text definitions and a renderer to create and modify complex diagrams. The main purpose of Mermaid is to help documentation catch up with development.
